column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Raiko says : " The borders are secure and troops are guarding the rail lines into the city .
#Text=Asami got the idea from watching dragonfly - hummingbirds .
#Text=You can take off straight up , fly in any direction — " Raiko says : " Where does the spirit ray come out ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " It does n't have a spirit ray .
#Text=I 'm telling you what I told Kuvira : That technology should not be used !
#Text=" Raiko says : " It 's already being used by Kuvira !
#Text=I need spirit vine weapons and I need them now !
#Text=" Korra says : " No .
#Text=It was Kuvira 's harvesting of the vines in the swamp that caused the Republic City vines to go crazy and grab all those people .
#Text=" Raiko says : " You 're supposed to be the bridge between the two worlds .
#Text=Why ca n't you harvest the vines ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I wo n't do that .
#Text=But maybe since the spirits love Republic City so much , I can convince them to help us defend it somehow .
#Text=" Raiko says : " Hm .

#Text=" Wu says : " Okay , maybe while the weapon geniuses and the spirit bridge are getting ready for battle , we should be evacuating the ordinary citizens so that if Kuvira attacks , they wo n't be hurt .
#Text=" Raiko says : " That 's ... actually a good idea .
#Text=Prince Wu , you work with the police to coordinate getting people out of the city .
#Text=Now everyone get to it .
#Text=I want daily updates .
#Text="
